name: Atoms
description:
According to the commander Lee, the atomic Legion was challenged by the suspected technology of its own side when the T star absorbed the energy of the star. Identified is Sajima Sakura secretly steal technology and combined with the T star organism, to create the mechanical life body mass. What is the purpose of Sakura to raise their eyes? What is the hidden secret behind this? Let's find out exactly...


—Based on VR,type of moba game.
—Single play with CPU.
—Multiple plays as a pair of teams or antagonism.
—3 heros to choose.
—9 weapons can play.
—Skill and equipment system.
—Upgrading and combo rewards.
—A strong sense of battle.
